name: Character's full name
description: Brief description or bio of the character
level: Character's level (usually a number between 1 and 20)
inspiration: Yes or No (whether the character has inspiration)
proficiency_bonus: Bonus added due to character's level (+2 to +6 typically)
alignment: Character's moral and ethical alignment (e.g., Lawful Good, Chaotic Neutral)
experience_points: Total experience points the character has earned
armor_class: Character's armor class (how hard they are to hit)
attacks_spellcasting: List of character's main attacks or spells, or N/A
languages: Languages the character can speak, read, and write
proficiencies: Skills and tools the character is proficient with
features_traits: Special abilities or features of the character
character_appearance: Detailed description of the character's appearance
allies_organizations: Allies, friends, and organizations the character is associated with
treasure: Valuable items or keepsakes the character possesses
spellcasting_ability: Primary ability for spellcasting (e.g., Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma) or N/A
spell_save_dc: Difficulty class for others to resist character's spells, or N/A
spell_attack_bonus: Bonus added to character's spell attacks, or N/A
1_level_spells: List of character's 1st-level spells, or N/A
2_level_spells: List of character's 2nd-level spells, or N/A
3_level_spells: List of character's 3rd-level spells, or N/A
4_level_spells: List of character's 4th-level spells, or N/A
5_level_spells: List of character's 5th-level spells, or N/A
6_level_spells: List of character's 6th-level spells, or N/A
7_level_spells: List of character's 7th-level spells, or N/A
8_level_spells: List of character's 8th-level spells, or N/A
9_level_spells: List of character's 9th-level spells, or N/A
portrait_prompt: A description prompt for artists to visualize and draw the character

name: Merlin
description: The legendary wizard and advisor to King Arthur.
bonds: Duty to protect Arthur and Camelot.
equipment: Wizard's robe, staff, spellbook, component pouch
character_appearance: An old man with a long white beard, wearing robes and carrying a staff.
allies_organizations: King Arthur, Knights of the Round Table, Lady of the Lake
character_backstory: Advisor to King Arthur and a master of the arcane arts. Has lived for centuries and has seen many things.
treasure: A crystal ball, a dragon's scale, a piece of the Round Table
1_level_spells: Magic Missile, Mage Armor, Detect Magic
portrait_prompt: A wise old wizard with piercing blue eyes, long white hair and beard, wearing a blue robe and holding a wooden staff.

name: Naima Serenade
description: A charismatic bard with a passion for storytelling and music, Naima travels the lands sharing tales of love and bravery.
personality_traits: Charming, witty, and loves being the center of attention.
bonds: Her lute, a family heirloom, and the love stories she's collected.
attacks_spellcasting: Rapier, Vicious Mockery, Cure Wounds, Dissonant Whispers
equipment: Lute, rapier, leather armor, entertainer's pack
features_traits: Bardic Inspiration, Song of Rest, College of Lore
character_appearance: A confident woman with dark skin, hazel eyes, and curly hair. She often wears colorful, flowy clothing and carries her lute everywhere.
allies_organizations: Local theaters, performers' guilds, and fellow bards she's met on her travels.
character_backstory: Raised in a coastal town, Naima found solace in music. Her tales of love reflect her own journey of acceptance and discovery.
treasure: A golden pendant, given by a lover from her past.
1_level_spells: Cure Wounds, Dissonant Whispers, Charm Person
portrait_prompt: A radiant bard with dark skin, adorned in vibrant clothes, her hazel eyes sparkling with mischief and charm as she strums her lute.

name: Steven Universe
description: A kind-hearted young man with gem-related powers, seeking to understand himself and protect the world.
personality_traits: Empathetic, compassionate, and always looking for the best in others.
bonds: His family, the Crystal Gems, and his hometown of Beach City.
flaws: Can be overly trusting and sometimes takes on too much responsibility.
attacks_spellcasting: Shield, Cure Wounds, Charm Person, Healing Word
equipment: Pink shirt, blue jeans, sandals, and his mother's gem which is embedded in his belly button.
features_traits: Gem Sorcery, Font of Magic, Metamagic
character_appearance: A teenage boy with a pink shirt and a gem embedded in his belly button. Always carries a ukulele.
character_backstory: Son of Rose Quartz and Greg Universe, Steven is a half-human, half-gem who grows up under the guidance of the Crystal Gems.
treasure: His ukulele, a gift from his father.
portrait_prompt: A cheerful teenager with a gem on his belly button, holding a ukulele and always ready to help those in need.

name: Thralia Moonshadow
description: A blind Tabaxi monk who relies on her heightened senses to perceive the world. She's known for her serene nature and swift combat skills.
personality_traits: Calm, introspective, and always listens more than she speaks.
bonds: The secluded monastery where she trained, and her mentor who taught her to 'see' without sight.
flaws: Struggles with modern civilization's pace and noise.
attacks_spellcasting: Unarmed strike, Flurry of Blows, Stunning Strike
equipment: Monk's robe, staff, herbalism kit, a small bell
features_traits: Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts, Evasion, Blindsense
character_appearance: A tall, lean Tabaxi with soft grey fur, dotted with darker spots. Her milky white eyes give away her blindness.
allies_organizations: Her monastery, other monks she has met during her travels.
character_backstory: Blinded in an accident as a cub, Thralia was taken in by monks who taught her to harness her inner energy and heightened senses.
treasure: A silver pendant with the emblem of her monastery.
portrait_prompt: A graceful Tabaxi monk with grey spotted fur, poised in a stance of readiness, her milky eyes filled with calm determination.

name: Lila Bramblefoot
description: A curious Halfling child with a knack for talking to animals and an insatiable sense of wonder.
personality_traits: Inquisitive, playful, and easily excited by nature.
ideals: Every creature has a story to tell.
bonds: Her pet squirrel, Nutters, and the city's stray animals.
flaws: Easily distracted and sometimes forgets about danger.
attacks_spellcasting: Shillelagh, Produce Flame, Speak with Animals
equipment: Druidic focus, hide armor, sling, herbalism kit, small knife, tiny wooden squirrel (a toy)
features_traits: Halfling Luck, Wild Shape (small animals only)
character_appearance: A small, sprightly Halfling child with bright green eyes, golden-brown hair in braids, and always accompanied by her squirrel.
allies_organizations: Local animals, a few kind-hearted city residents.
character_backstory: Orphaned at a young age, Lila roamed the city streets and parks, soon discovering her unique connection to animals.
treasure: A tiny wooden squirrel toy, given to her by her mother.
portrait_prompt: A young Halfling with a gleam of mischief in her eyes, braided hair, and a squirrel perched on her shoulder, curiously observing the world.
